announcements.name: [October 30] Co-op Management Re-Enabled
announcements.description: Hello. The Co-op Management Menu has been disabled for a long time following a wipe situation.

announcements.name: SkyBlock Patch Notes 0.19.6 - The Great Spook & More
announcements.description: Hello! Welcome to SkyBlock Patch 0.19.6. This update contains permanent Spooky content in the form of The Great Spook, several additions and changes to Essence Shops, and much more!
